thread.title: AirWatch Connect 2015 Recap: It’s All About Control
thread.title_full: AirWatch Connect 2015 Recap: It’s All About Control

author: Parizo, Eric
title: AirWatch Connect 2015 Recap: It’s All About Control
text: October 16, 2015 Rate this report Advisory Report At its annual conference, AirWatch demonstrated that its management team is committed to a wide-ranging, ambitious strategy featuring deeper VMware integration and growing competition with a big field of endpoint configuration management players.
